Package hero.core.algorithm.metaheuristic.sa

Class SimulatedAnnealing<T extends Variable<?>>

java.lang.Object
hero.core.algorithm.Algorithm<T>
hero.core.algorithm.metaheuristic.sa.SimulatedAnnealing<T>
public class SimulatedAnnealing<T extends Variable<?>>
extends Algorithm<T>
Class implementing the simulated annealing technique for problem solving. Works only for one objective. Does not require temperature to be given because it automatically adapts the parameters: Natural Optimization [de Vicente et al., 2000]
Author:
J. M. Colmenar, José L. Risco Martín

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulatedAnnealing

      public SimulatedAnnealing​(Problem<T> problem, java.lang.Integer maxIterations, java.lang.Double k, java.lang.Double targetObj)
      Parameterized constructor
      Parameters:
      problem - Problem to be solved
      maxIterations - number of iterations where the search will stop.
      k - is the weight of the temperature (Default = 1.0)
      targetObj - If the algorithm reaches this obj, the optimization stops (Default = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY)

    • SimulatedAnnealing

      public SimulatedAnnealing​(Problem<T> problem, java.lang.Integer maxIterations)
      This constructor allows to establish the maximum number of iterations.
      Parameters:
      problem - Problem to be solved
      maxIterations - number of iterations where the search will stop.
